no_permission_to_edit_label_category: You do not have permission to edit this label category.
no_permission_to_create_label_category: You do not have permission to create this label category.
label_category_helper: Label categories are groups for organizing product specifications. For example, in clothing, "Size" is a :labelCategory. During label creation, labels like "S", "M", "L" are assigned to the "Size" category. Well-organized categories help your customers find products easily. Better customer experience equals more sales!
status_helper: A status shows the condition of your products. For example, in books, "Damaged" is a :status. During status assignment, all books can be marked as "Damaged", or a specific number of them (like "3 out of 15 books"). Well-organized statuses help you track your inventory accurately.
label_helper: A label is a specification that describes your product's characteristics. For example, in electronics, "128GB" is a :label that belongs to the "Memory Capacity/Storage" label category. Well-organized labels help customers find desired products more easily. Better user experience leads to higher sales potential!
label_name_placeholder: e.g., XL, Silk, 128GB, 2m x 3m, 1kg, Premium, DDR5 etc.
label_name_max_length: Label name must be at most 200 characters long.
label_name_already_exists: A label with this name already exists in the selected category.
no_label_changes: No updates to this label yet - everything's up to date!

subsidiaries_assigning_on_product: If no subsidiaries are selected, the product will be visible in all subsidiaries and available to all employees. Selecting specific subsidiaries will restrict product visibility only to those selected subsidiaries and their employees.
warehouses_assigning_on_product: If no warehouses are selected, the product will be visible in all warehouses and available to all employees. Selecting specific warehouses will restrict product visibility only to those selected warehouses and their employees.
